title: Cyberpedagogy-Based LMS Model Development: Mathematics Learning Courses Using Simulation/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: For professionals (medical/legal/technical) adapting to post-COVID remote learning, utilizing VR simulations and lightweight LMS tools in smartphone-limited environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain 3D geometry problem-solving procedures with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can perform peer assessment and feedback exchange processes three or more times using interactive tools within an LMS.
Learners complete over 90% of multidimensional learning materials (videos, quizzes, virtual experiments) provided in a mobile-based LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
